trans-unit.source: Represents a declaration for a property of a type.
CodeMemberProperty can be used to represent the declaration for a property of a type.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.Type%2A> property specifies the data type of the property.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.GetStatements%2A> property contains any get statement methods for the property.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.SetStatements%2A> property contains any set statement methods for the property.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.Parameters%2A> property specifies any parameters for the property, such as are required for an indexer property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> statements for the property.
One of the statements in this <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> should return the value for the member property.
Use a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReturnStatement> to return a value of the data type of the property.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> statements for the member property.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property has a <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> method accessor.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Count" name="Count" href=""></xref> property of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.GetStatements*> collection is non-zero, or if the value of this property has been set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property has a <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> method accessor.
HasSet will return `false` if the property is read-only.
> [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `false` will clear the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.SetStatements%2A> collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count*> property of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberProperty.SetStatements*> collection is non-zero; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the data types of any interfaces that the property implements.
The types referenced by this collection must consist of interfaces.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"></xref> that indicates the data types the property implements.
Gets the collection of declaration expressions for the property.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeParameterDeclarationExpressionCollection"></xref> that indicates the declaration expressions for the property.
Gets or sets the data type of the interface, if any, this property, if private, implements.
The type referenced by this property must be an interface.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type of the interface, if any, the property, if private, implements.
Gets the collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> statements for the property.
One of the statements in this collection typically sets a value for the property.
Often, the statements within a set method accessor perform checking to determine whether to set or translate the specified value for the property.
A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression> represents a reference to the object passed to the set method.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> statements for the member property.
Gets or sets the data type of the property.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type of the property.
